activities.name: Homeless Shelter Coordinator
activities.description: Organized meal service and life skills workshops
activities.impact: Served 1000+ meals, helped 15 people find stable housing

activities.name: Peer Counseling Program
activities.description: Provided emotional support to struggling classmates
activities.impact: Supported 25+ students through academic and personal challenges

core_values.description: Dedicating life to helping others in need

defining_moments.title: Helping Someone Find Housing
defining_moments.description: Supporting a homeless individual through housing application
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Witnessing transformation from despair to hope
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Small actions can create profound change

defining_moments.title: A Meal that Changed Lives
defining_moments.description: While coordinating a meal service at the homeless shelter, I witnessed a man's transformation from hopelessness to optimism. This experience taught me that providing basic needs can ignite hope and change lives profoundly.

defining_moments.title: The Power of Peer Support
defining_moments.description: As a peer counselor, I helped a classmate navigate personal challenges, fostering a supportive environment. This role honed my empathy and reinforced my commitment to aiding others through understanding and shared experiences.

defining_moments.title: Finding Home for the Homeless
defining_moments.description: I assisted a homeless individual in successfully applying for housing, witnessing their journey from despair to hope. This experience reinforced my belief that small actions can lead to profound change in someone's life.
